channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Source notation?" - Should we have multiple sources on the source line?

item.title: Re: Source notation?
item.content:encoded: I would agree that if a page has multiple sources, they should all be listed.

item.title: Source notation?
item.content:encoded:
Often, spells, magic items, and sometimes monsters (though this wiki doesn't have those) will be from multiple sources, such as Elemental Evil Player's Companion and Xanathar's Guide to Everything, Eberron: Rising From the Last War and Tasha's Cauldron of Everything, or Explorer's Guide to Wildemount and Tasha's Cauldron of Everything. Should we put multiple sources when applicable?
I personally feel we should for the people that are using only 1 other source besides the PHB, but I don't know if all the alternate sources like Wildemount and Eberron are made obsolete by the sources people are replacing them with.
